name: World's scariest police chases
description: World's Scariest Police Chases is a wild, no-holds-barred driving game that puts you in control of the action as a police officer chasing and apprehending law-breaking criminals. Perpetrators lead you on a slew of hazardous, breackneck chases as they try to avoid being captured for such crimes as drunk driving, drug smuggling and terrorism. Pursue your suspects through a dynamic city, taking shortcuts and using aggresive tactics to apprehend them and uphold the law.
